entries.m_sorry: I'm sorry, I don't have anything to give you or even promise you...
entries.m_betrayed: But... but he's been stalking me. He's been harassing me. He won't let me alone! You... you--Oh, I HATE you!
entries.m_saved: Really? And he means it? Oh, I KNEW he wasn't all bad!
entries.a_no_progress: I can' t believe this. I HATE her, this is crazy!!
entries.a_tired_waiting: That's enough! I'm not going to stand for this anymore!
entries.a_brushoff: Don't even speak to me! Oh, what have I done...
entries.a_thank_negotiate_again: Thank you so much for reconciling us.
entries.a_negotiate_fail: She what? This is the girl who I suspect has been sneaking around on me? Nuh uh, that's enough of this garbage.
entries.a_waiting: Come on... I can't stand around all day waiting for her to make up her mind.
entries.a_greet_mad: You didn't fall for her ridiculous story did you? I can't stand this... she's pushing me over the edge.
entries.minion_4: Do you think I have a shot with her if he dumps her?
entries.minion_3: Well, I think the girl has a point.
entries.minion_2: Why doesn't he just dump her?
entries.minion_1: I can't believe we came all the way out here over a woman.
entries.a_thank_negotiate: Thank you so much for bringing us back together!
entries.a_thank_combat: I... I can't believe we did that. We... we killed her. I... loved her. What have I done?
entries.a_respond_m_1: I'd never hurt you... you know that!
entries.m_greet_a: Silly? Silly? You're actually SCARING me and you call it silly? And why did you bring your stupid friends with you huh? Are you here to hurt me?
entries.a_greet_m: There you are... sweetie, why don't you come back with me? This argument is silly.
entries.m_waiting: He's liable to bring those friends of his. Always stinking up the house and making messes. They're bad influences. Watch, they might have egged him on to do something that we'll all regret...
entries.m_thank_negotiate: Thank you so much. I guess we're back together again. I really hated to start the fight, but the silly boy just wouldn't... anyway. Thank you! Do you do weddings?
entries.response_negotiate: It looks to me like you guys are in love, and it seems silly to end up with a fight and even possibly a tragic death of a simple lovers' quarrel.
entries.m_negotiate_greet: What did he say? He's got such a way of sweet-talking, I'm afraid I'll give in if I talk to him... will he let me be?
entries.a_accept_offer: That's all she wants? Time to herself? Why didn't she just SAY so?
entries.a_decline_offer: Space? What space? She has all the free time in the world! She lives off my income, sits at home all day, gossips with her friends... This is crazy. I'm not taking this anymore.
entries.m_no_negotiate: He just doesn't understand. He's so controlling.
entries.m_will_negotiate: I guess.. I guess I'm willing to talk. I just need him to give me space, you know? I feel smothered. I need time to myself.
entries.a_no_negotiate: Stay out of this, this is a private matter between us.
entries.a_maybe: I've never needed an intermediary to talk to my girl before. Sure, if you think it'll help, go ahead. I just want her to come home.
entries.a_yes: Great! I'm sure she'll calm down in a while, and this will all blow over.
entries.a_no: I won't give her up. She's just being irrational. If she won't come with me, I'll MAKE her come back.
entries.m_maybe: Talk to him, please? Tell him that he needs to let me go.I know he loves me, but he's going too far.
entries.a_greet_imperial: There she is. C'mon sweetie, I told you it was all just a misunderstanding! Why don't you come on back? See, she gets like this, she's just moody sometimes.
entries.a_greet_rebel: There she is. C'mon sweetie, I told you it was all just a misunderstanding! Why don't you come on back? See, she gets like this, she's just moody sometimes.
entries.m_thank_combat: Oh no... you... killed him! But... I didn't mean... I loved him.
entries.m_yes: You don't understand... he's abusive, he never leaves me alone. I feel like I'm being stalked.
entries.a_greet: There she is. C'mon sweetie, I told you it was all just a misunderstanding! Why don't you come on back? See, she gets like this, she's just moody sometimes.
entries.m_greet: Help me, please. My boyfriend, he's chasing me, and I'm scared.
